## NodeCanvasRenderingContext2D.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `NodeCanvasRenderingContext2D` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  canvas | <code>NINodeCanvas</code> | Reference to the canvas that this rendering context is for. |
